definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: The end is cut at an angle and shaved regularly as it wears out.
sentences.chinese: 底端以角度被切斷的和刨光，因爲它經常磨損。

sentences.english: Carefully pull back the access line. The kink should be in the bottom of the burr hole.
sentences.chinese: 小心的往後拉入顱線，扭結應處於單孔的底端。

sentences.english: At the bottom, it's very concrete.
sentences.chinese: 在底端，它是比較具體的。

sentences.english: Well, memory is this rectangle, by default, they're located at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 好的，內存是這個長方形，默認的，它們位於底端。

sentences.english: This is somewhat of a artist's rendition, but they're at the very bottom of my RAM.
sentences.chinese: 這個是有點表演藝術的，但是它們在我內存的底端。

sentences.english: We're defining the function at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 我們在底端定義那個函數。

sentences.english: The audio room laced at the end of corridor in the second floor, just next to the office.
sentences.chinese: 位於二樓走廊底端，米庫文化辦公區域的隔壁。

sentences.english: Now, Jack is at the bottom. He takes an ax and cuts the beanstalk. Whack!
sentences.chinese: 傑克現在到了底端，他拿起一把斧頭往豆莖砍。

sentences.english: Now, Jack is at the bottom. He takes an ax and cuts the beanstalk.
sentences.chinese: 傑克現在到了底端，他拿起一把斧頭往豆莖砍。

sentences.english: The mercury seems painted to the bottom of the thermometer.
sentences.chinese: 溫度計裏的水銀柱降到了底端。

sentences.english: Bottom-end bass frequencies usually get lost when the volume is set at a low level.
sentences.chinese: 底端低音頻率通常會丟失量處於較低水平。

sentences.english: The bottom of the candle is fused with its holder.
sentences.chinese: 蠟燭的底端與燭臺熔在一起。

sentences.english: The sacrum is the bone that is shaped like an upside-down triangle at the base of the spine.
sentences.chinese: 骶骨位於脊椎底端，是一個向上的三角形。

sentences.english: I hike to the base of a waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 需要長途跋涉才能來到冰瀑的底端。

sentences.english: Individual jet maxima are frequently found at the tips of deep low-pressure troughs.
sentences.chinese: 某些急流其最大風速中心常發現位於深低壓槽的底端。

sentences.english: Most of it was burned, but the bottom of one page was not burned.
sentences.chinese: 大部分信已燒焦了，只有一頁信紙的底端還未被燒盡。

definition: vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
